result.reason: Current startup database picker is limited to SQL mode and ignores cancellation; needs a proper selector for File vs SQL Profiles.
result.approach: Modify Runtime.cs to check for picker setting regardless of mode. Update FrmPickDatabase to support selection of connection source.
